name: Froggy, Take the Wheel
description:
Froggy, take the wheel
Take it from my hands
'Cause I can't do this on my own

Controls
  • F, space bar, or left mouse button to jump
How to play
  • Don't get hit by a car
  • Jump onto a car to get one point and jump into a froghole cover to get five points
Credits
  • Game by Eva Lee
  • m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen
